data.name: Feature_FastDelivery_Desc
data.value: Automatic delivery system. Buy and receive in-game in seconds.

data.name: Feature_FairPlay_Desc
data.value: Active and understanding administration 24/7. Only skill matters.

data.name: Feature_Stability_Desc
data.value: Dedicated server in Europe, good ping, no lags during PVP.

data.name: Info_Subtitle
data.value: Project created by players for players. Here is what sets us apart.

data.name: Info_Card1_Desc
data.value: Hundreds of players choose VARTA every day. Here you will find partners for raids, trading, and survival. Our community is not just a server, but a whole ecosystem.

data.name: Info_Card2_Desc
data.value: Our admin team works 24/7. Any issue - from technical problems to game disputes - is resolved quickly and fairly via Discord or email.

data.name: Info_Card3_Desc
data.value: Payment is instant and secure. After transaction confirmation, the item appears in your inventory automatically - no manual intervention, no delays.

data.name: Info_Card4_Desc
data.value: Every ticket, every message - we react promptly. Average admin response time is up to 30 minutes. Your comfort in the game is our main priority.

data.name: Info_Card5_Desc
data.value: Custom delivery system, unique store, and Steam integration - we constantly implement new technologies to make your VARTA experience as convenient as possible.

data.name: Info_Card6_Desc
data.value: Dedicated server in Europe with 99.9% uptime. Regular updates, optimized loot, and stable ping - everything so that PVP and raids bring only pleasure.

data.name: Support_Discord_Desc
data.value: The fastest way to get help from admin. Create a ticket in #support channel.

data.name: Support_Email_Desc
data.value: For cooperation, donations or ban appeals if Discord is unavailable.

data.name: Support_FAQ_A1
data.value: Make sure you are on the server. Open menu with "B" key and select the item you purchased.

data.name: Support_FAQ_Q2
data.value: I found a cheater, what to do?

data.name: Support_FAQ_A2
data.value: Record video proof and open a ticket in Discord. We will check logs.

data.name: Support_FAQ_A4
data.value: Go to "Store" page, select item and click "Buy".

data.name: Rules_Subtitle
data.value: Ignorance of rules does not excuse you from responsibility.

data.name: Rules_Alert_Body
data.value: We care about fair play. We strongly advise recording your gameplay (kills, raids, disputes). This is your only defense against false accusations. Administration has the right to request video recording. Use NVIDIA Experience, AMD ReLive or OBS.

data.name: Rules_Footer
data.value: The server is private. Owner has the right to refuse service without explanation. By playing on the server, you automatically agree to these rules.

data.name: Footer_Desc
data.value: Best DayZ survival server. Stable economy, active administration and unique game mechanics.

data.name: Admin_Products_Desc
data.value: Create, edit and delete products in the store. Manage product catalog, set prices and categories.

data.name: Admin_Users_Desc
data.value: View user information, balance, purchase history and transactions. Full control over user base.

data.name: Admin_Servers_Desc
data.value: Manage game server list. Add new servers, update IP addresses and delete outdated ones.

data.name: Profile_Error_Load
data.value: Failed to load profile. Try again later.

data.name: Profile_TopUp_Info
data.value: Balance is credited automatically within 1-2 minutes after payment.

data.name: Profile_History_Empty
data.value: You haven't made any purchases yet.

data.name: Rule_Gen_1_1
data.value: Using any third-party software or modifications (cheats, WH, ReShade, etc.) is prohibited. NVIDIA Experience is allowed.

data.name: Rule_Gen_1_2
data.value: Bug abuse is prohibited: moonwalk, raid holograms, looking through walls, blocking passages with tents.

data.name: Rule_Gen_1_3
data.value: Providing false information or misleading the administration is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Gen_1_4
data.value: Transport limit: 5 units per base. Additional storage must be at least 150m away.

data.name: Rule_Gen_1_6
data.value: Public or private negative statements about the administration are prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Gen_1_7
data.value: Interfering with or obstructing the work of the administration is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Gen_1_8
data.value: Camping or killing players at their spawn points (spawn kill) is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Gen_1_9_Punishment
data.value: (Twink ban permanent + main account up to 7 days)

data.name: Rule_Gen_1_10
data.value: Head admin has the right to intervene in gameplay and change punishments.

data.name: Rule_Const_2_1
data.value: Building on military bases, hospitals, heli crashes, water pumps is prohibited. (Exceptions: Prison Island, taverns, hunting cabins).

data.name: Rule_Const_2_2
data.value: Building within 200m of military bases (Tisy, NWAF, VMC etc. - red zones on map) is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Const_2_3
data.value: Placing items with collision on roads is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Const_2_4
data.value: Building on roads (except dirt roads and dead ends) is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Const_2_5
data.value: Maximum base height — 3 floors. All supports must touch the surface (except water). Building in the air is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Const_2_6
data.value: Blocking static doors with textures is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Const_2_7
data.value: Blocking passages with foundations, building "fence in fence", fan or cross-shaped is prohibited. Overlap allowed up to half.

data.name: Rule_Const_2_8
data.value: Rebuilding after raid: You can place 1 wall if 5 elements of enemy base were destroyed. Time for rebuilding — 1 hour. Base becomes yours if all locks are removed.

data.name: Rule_Const_2_9
data.value: Tents allowed to stack only: Car -> Military -> Small. Max 3 in one.

data.name: Rule_Const_2_10
data.value: Placing any markings that block ladders is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Raid_3_1
data.value: Raiding by placing items in the air (barrels, towers, tents on top of each other) is prohibited. All supports must be on the ground.

data.name: Rule_Raid_3_2
data.value: Bug raiding (campfires, garden plots, car parts) is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Raid_3_3
data.value: Logging out (Combat Log) in your base during a raid is prohibited.

data.name: Rule_Raid_3_4
data.value: Building or repairing base during active raid is prohibited. (Placing wires/locks is allowed).

data.name: Rule_Raid_3_5
data.value: You MUST have a video recording of the raid. Keep recording for 5 days (120 hours). Without video, administration may ban raid participants in disputed situations.

data.name: Profile_Donation_Warning
data.value: Please do not change or fill in any information manually — the system does it automatically. Changing details may prevent your payment from being credited. All you need to do is pay with the option convenient for you. Sincerely, site developer and VARTA team :)
